answers.answer: Yes typically you get tested at 24 weeks but if your urine or any other symptoms show you could have it possibly  they will test you really I am how ever suprised they didn't tell you they were giving you the test.. I'm sorry to hear I have been tested since bout 12 weeks.
I just got tested last week and have to do the 3 hr glucose test on monday, i will be 15 weeks when i get that one done

question: Has anyone been diagnosed with diabetes at 13 weeks? I was today and am devastated. My doctor tested me earlier than usual but didn't say why (at the time I didn't know she was testing early but after researching it your usually tested at 24wks.
title: diabetes
